spots.name: Waitangi Park
spots.info: avoid on Sundays, the nearby markets attract Yo-Pros and their spawn, you will have a bad time

spots.name: Karori Ramps
spots.info: one vert ramp, one mini-ramp. Mini can get crowded on good days since it is uncontested best Wgtn mini-ramp. Both have skate-lite surface very nice and good transitions.

spots.name: Tree-Tops
spots.info: Wellys well loved DIY, mostly street terrain: boxes, rails, a few A-frames. There a few nice quarters, and a kooky mini-ramp.
